H0.text: what did coretta scott king died from. Ovarian Cancer

H1.text: what did coretta scott king died from. Heart Disease

H2.text: what did coretta scott king died from. Stroke

H3.text: what did coretta scott king died from. Respiratory failure

A4.text: The main cause of her death is believed to be respiratory failure due to complications from ovarian cancer.

A5.text: In August 2005, King suffered a stroke which paralyzed her right side and left her unable to speak; five months later, she died of respiratory failure due to complications from ovarian cancer.
